title: All the areas underlying welfare halls, society office, balwadi/s, religious structure/s and the commercial areas given by way of incentives to the Co-operative Housing Society shall be free of cost and shall form part of rehabilitation component and shall be considered for incentive F
clause_text: All the areas underlying welfare halls, society office, balwadi/s, religious structure/s and the commercial areas given by way of incentives to the Co-operative Housing Society shall be free of cost and shall form part of rehabilitation component and shall be considered for incentive F.S.I. computation for the free sale component as per the provisions in the said Regulations.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
